fields.name: eggibite
fields.comment: Absolutely phenomenal photographer! I appreciated how relaxed yet professional the atmosphere was. As well as just being a lovely person to talk to, I felt comfortable bouncing off ideas. The photos themselves are beautiful, and I felt like he had my best interest in mind adjusting my posing and such. Would 100% book again, I loved everything!

fields.name: the.weze
fields.comment: Hun Jae is so much fun to shoot with, he’s always so patient and somehow always manages to get the good angles :,) he is so insanely talented, he’s absolutely my favorite person to shoot with!! <3

fields.name: starrdustss_
fields.comment: Hun Jae is one of the most professional, talented and funniest photographers I have worked with! He is super easygoing, and will get the perfect shot absolutely no matter what. I love the photos I have from Hun Jae and I can’t wait to get even more!

fields.name: the.fungits
fields.comment: Hun Jae isn’t just an amazing photographer, he has also become one of my best friends. The first time I shot with him I was new to photos and was really nervous, but Hun Jae was super helpful in making me feel comfortable posing. Since then I’ve always trusted him to be not only a great photographer but also a safe space at cons and in general!

fields.name: random_chibi.cos
fields.comment: I've been lucky enough to work with Hun Jae on a few occasions and each time was absolutely wonderful. His attention to detail, use of natural light and angles, and his ability to listen to the client is above and beyond most other photographers.

fields.name: chellypup
fields.comment: Getting the chance to work with Hun Jae was such a great time. Despite it being the first time we met I felt so comfortable and safe working with them. The finished photos also came out absolutely beautiful. I look forward to working with Hun Jae in the future.

fields.name: dueling_pisces
fields.comment: I can't recommend Hun Jae enough!! He is skilled in many different types of lighting and areas and is always open to trying new things. Your comfortability is number one and what you want and I'm always excited to shoot with him again!
